Text: @babybluetits24: No, they are embedded in the mkv file, you can switch between plaintext SRT or colorcoded ASS subtitles, or turn them off altogether.

I have watched the first 15 mins or so of this documentary now and am impressed by the style of presentation. I think it helps, that they are both comedians as mentioned. Not a boring moment. The visuals are spectacular too. Thank you very much.
